about_the_game:
Control Pawns

In every randomly generated island, you control workers called "Pawns".
These pawns can be assigned to do errands, RTS-style.
Pawns will also do smaller errands, eat, and perform necessities automatically, leaving you only to control what you focus on at a time.


Build Your Kingdom

Upgrading your island town hall unlocks further progression, such as specialized professions for the pawns!
Expand your kingdom as you gather resources and craft items.
Buildings such as the workshop allow pawns to be assigned to complete crafting bills ordered.



Strategize Combat

You are not alone on this island and must confront the wildlife and monsters with fighters such as knights and archers.
Sometimes you might get raided by mischievous invaders, so preparation is necessary.



Discover Mysteries

Every island holds unique discoveries to be made, and sometimes the only way to find out is to take a risk.
Maybe you'll find out who that necromancer on the other island really is!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Internal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Island survival RTS, with mysteries behind every corner. Assign your pawns to gather, craft, fight, study, and do other errands for your kingdom. Every randomly generated island holds unique secrets to be uncovered. As the Duke of Pawnholm, will you lead your pawns to prosperity ...or to calamity?
